name: Better Things
overview: Sam Fox is a single, working actor with no filter trying to raise her three daughters – Max, Frankie and Duke – in Los Angeles. She is mom, dad, referee and the cops.

episodes.name: Brown
episodes.overview: Sam brings home a colleague for dinner.

episodes.name: Woman Is the Something of the Something
Future Fever
episodes.overview: Sam has snack and Max thinks about things.

episodes.name: Phil
episodes.overview: Sam is forced to look at some stuff.

episodes.name: White Rock
episodes.overview: Sam and the girls go on a trip.

episodes.name: Chicago
episodes.overview: Sam and Max go on a trip.

episodes.name: Nesting
episodes.overview: Sam sees old friends and cooks for everyone.

episodes.name: What Is Jeopardy?
episodes.overview: Sam and fam get caught up in some gnar.

episodes.name: Easter
episodes.overview: Sam helps Max and bakes for Phil.

episodes.name: Shake the Cocktail
episodes.overview: Sam searches and takes a breath.

episodes.name: Steady Rain
episodes.overview: Sam picks the girls up from a trip.

episodes.name: Escape Drill
episodes.overview: Sam gives her friends a marital intervention.

episodes.name: DNA
episodes.overview: Sam gives Phil a DNA test, catches something and releases on Max.

episodes.name: Carbonara
episodes.overview: Sam takes Duke to ballet and Frankie to Pinkberry.

episodes.name: High Man. Bye Man.
episodes.overview: Sam goes to the weed store and visits her brother and Frankie and Sam eat ice cream.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: Sam has a flashback and a wolf pack.

episodes.name: Listen to the Roosters
episodes.overview: Sam and her girls live in the City of Angels.

episodes.name: F*ck Anatoly's Mom
episodes.overview: Sam learns some things about her family.

episodes.name: Oh, I'm Not Gonna Tell Her
Ephemera
episodes.overview: Sam learns about pronouns and finance.

episodes.name: The World Is Mean Right Now
San Francisco
episodes.overview: Sam goes to San Francisco for a job while Max holds down the fort.

episodes.name: Family Meeting
episodes.overview: Sam fights zombies and Frankie dresses up.

episodes.name: England
episodes.overview: Sam and fam take a trip. Sam needs the circle to be complete.
